Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Gary Zoll (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/26/2015, off Lawrence Cadiz (SF)...

1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,864,286 through salary arbitration...
Released by Houston on 4/1/2019...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (C) on 4/16/2019 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Released by St. Louis (C) on 6/10/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 3/2/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $612,000 per year...
